attributes.action: TELL US WHY POLITICIANS DO NOT SEE THAT POPULIST VIEW MEANS THAT THAT IS WHAT THE PEOPLE WANT?
attributes.additional_details:
What we want you to do for us is in uppercase letter above.  You seem, so often, to be unable to identify what we want you to do.  We hope this is helpful.

Politicians who have been proved to be monumentally wrong and massively out of touch with the people over the last week, continue to tell us that it is because of populism, as if populism is something to be avoided at all cost.  Populism IS democracy - WHAT THE PEOPLE WANT - and THAT is all that matters.  WHY CAN YOU NOT ACCEPT THAT TO BE POPULAR YOU HAVE TO DO WHAT THE PEOPLE WANT - POPULISM!  You are there to represent us, not yourselves, SO GET ON AND DO YOUR JOB, FOR ONCE, REPRESENT US.
